DOC.brief_summary: The objective study evaluate safety efficacy Acclarent Tympanostomy Tube Delivery System ( TTDS ) placement tympanostomy tube ( TT ) local anesthesia office/clinic setting .
DOC.criteria: Scheduled undergo tympanostomy tube insertion At least 6 month old Behavioral capacity cooperative temperament undergo awake procedure ( base physician judgement ) History sensitivity reaction anesthesia choose procedure Significantly atrophic , bimeric , completely atelectatic tympanic membrane Otitis externa Anatomy precludes sufficient visualization access tympanic membrane Anatomy necessitate tympanostomy tube placement posterior half tympanic membrane
